item.title: Counterfactual Explanation in Multivariate Time Series
item.description: Ates E, Aksar B, Leung VJ, Coskun AK. Counterfactual Explanations for Machine Learning on Multivariate Time Series Data. arXiv [cs.LG]. 2020.
